Description: Fragment of the leg-bone of an ox; part of a foundation-deposit, possibly once part of a sacrificial offering.
Authority: Ruler: Psamtek I (from context of the find)
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tell Dafana, "Qasr", casemate building A, beneath the SE corner
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 54 § 52, p. 55 § 54, pl. xxii, xxiii, 15)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.54, p.176, pl.18, p.244, pl.86)
